<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Triple Time](/Feats.aspx?ID=190) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 101 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You learn the [_triple time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=392) composition cantrip, which speeds up you and your allies for a round.
name: Triple Time
